product.name: LUISLADDERS Step Ladder 4 Step Lightweight Folding Step Ladder Aluminum Step Stool with Widened Anti-Slip Strip Pedal Convenient Handgrip 350lbs EN131, Multi-use for Household and Office
product.bullet_points:
• Widened Step & Anti-slip Strip Pedal Design - Specially customized for middle-aged and elderly friends, This tall step ladder desiged with higher safety performance. The 4 step stool ladder with the wider Step and Anti-slip strip pedal. It is very sturdy and safety to climbing up and down, even with your hands full of dishes, food, or cookware. The extended top hadfrails makes you feel very secure when on the top rung. The steps are wide and deep enough to comfortably stand on
• Non-slip Rubber Feet - Folding step ladder anti-slip rubber wrapped non-slip feet offer stability and protect different flooring types; Large handgrip offers you extra support when you step on the top, to offer you heel-to-toe foot support and eliminate foot fatigue. Our lightweight step ladder has been approved by ANSI Certificate. Compared with most traditional stepladders, ours are more safe and stable. Holds Maximum 350 lbs weight with no problems
• Lightweight & Space-saving Ladder - This tall step ladder is extremely Lightweight and compact size, easy to transport and store, opens and closes very easily, and fits into a small space room when not in use. Easy to stored in a narrow place-in your garage, under the bed or against a wall corner
• Beautiful & Widely Usage - Folding step stool can be multi work as a display stand to store your potted planted plant, flowers or books. It not only can use as a ladder, also can be used as a Chair or Little Pet Step Stool. White and orange frame gives an eye-catching look and matches well with any home decoration. This kitchen ladder also great for being used in the kitchen, garage, laundry room to clean, do home repairs
• Hassle Free Warranty - LUISLADDERS specializes in researching and excavating customer needs, and is committed to providing customers with more user-friendly products. Purchase with coffidence! LUISLADDERS all product have 2 year guarantee, easy return policy and 100% satisfaction customer service. Any problem please contact us without hesitation
